## rollup-plugin-keep-header-comment package

A rollup plugin to keep the header comments from source in the declaration file

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [keepHeaderComment(options)](./rollup-plugin-keep-header-comment.keepheadercomment.md) | Put the first multi-line comment at the start of the output chunk before the import statements, if pattern is provided, find the first comment that matches the pattern. |
